document_data.caption: A map showing al-Zulm Islands at the heart of the Crowded Sea.
document_data.name: Al-Zulm Islands
document_data.mainbody: '''Al-Zulm Islands''' was a large archipelago found in the [[Crowded Sea]] within [[west Zakhara]].
document_data.Geography:
The archipelago was one of several prominent island groups congesting the Crowded Sea. The northernmost island in al-Zulm Islands was located {{SI|60|mi|k|long=yes}} south of the [[Pearl Banks]], which were close to the southeastern peninsula of the [[Pearl Cities]].

Thirteen individual islands were part of the archipelago. The [[Zakharan (ethnicity)|Zakharans]] named some of these uninhabited islands as listed below:

* [[Anklis Island]]
* [[Manhus Island]]
* [[Qusur Island]]
* [[Saliam Island]]
